channel.title: Changing Spell name?[PI]
channel.description:
Hey , could anyone help me change a spells name Like 'air strike' to '???Strike' i searched through my client and i cant find it anywhere
Any ideas THANKS!:D

item.title: Changing Spell name?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

Go to your player class server sided. Once there search for public String getSpellName(int id) {
Under that you should see your teleport names. Then just find the spell name you want to change and change it. I might be wrong on the class, but I can’t check if I’m right atm.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Spell name?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

You can change that server-sided somewhere in your teleports class, magic class etc.

Sorry I don’t know the exact class names. Just skim, go through everything your self and you’ll find EVERYTHING.

Goodluck :rolleyes:

Read full topic
